title: appa un ponnaDi
sahitya:
appA un ponnaDi turappEnO nidam anbu malar shoriya marappEnO tillai



anupallavi



appAluk-kappAlAm arivu nilai vandAlum advaita svarUpattil Aruyir

kalandAlum



caraNam 1



nIyinri enakkoru nilaiyuNDO nalla nIrinri mInukku vAzhuvNDO ayyA

tAyinri sheykkoru gatiyuNDO un dayavinri enakkoru matiyuNDO tillai



caraNam 2



kATTuginrAi unnai kANginrEn engum karuNaiyuDan anbaraik-kAkkinrAi

ayyA

ATTuginrAi adanAl AduginrEn ulagil aruLuginrAi aruLaip-pADuginrEn tillai
